#summary Misc information about Atmel AVR programming

= Introduction =


= Details =
== avr-gcc ==
=== make elf ===
{{{
# avr-gcc -mmcu=attiny2313 -o main.elf main.c
}}}
== avr-objcopy ==
=== make hex from elf ===
{{{
# avr-objcopy -R .eeprom -O ihex main.elf main.hex
}}}
== avrdude ==
=== write hex ===
{{{
# avrdude -c avrispmkII -P usb -p t2313 -U flash:w:main.hex
}}}
